feature_descriptions.X2: 带内平坦度 (inband flatness / ripple variance)
feature_descriptions.X3: 高频段衰减斜率 (HF attenuation slope)
feature_descriptions.X4: 频率标度非线性度 (frequency scale nonlinearity)
feature_descriptions.X5: 幅度缩放一致性 (amplitude scale consistency)
feature_descriptions.X7: 增益非线性 (gain nonlinearity / max step)
feature_descriptions.X9: 调谐线性度残差 (tuning linearity residual)
feature_descriptions.X10: 频段幅度一致性 (band amplitude consistency)
feature_descriptions.X11: 超出动态包络点占比 (envelope overrun rate)
feature_descriptions.X12: 最大包络违规幅度 (max envelope violation)
feature_descriptions.X13: 包络违规能量 (envelope violation energy)
feature_descriptions.X14: 低频段残差均值 (low band residual mean)
feature_descriptions.X15: 高频段残差方差 (high band residual std)
feature_descriptions.X16: 互相关滞后 (correlation shift / frequency shift proxy)
feature_descriptions.X17: 频轴缩放因子 (frequency axis warp scale)
feature_descriptions.X18: 频轴平移因子 (frequency axis warp bias)
feature_descriptions.X20: 去趋势残差峰度 (detrended residual kurtosis)
feature_descriptions.X21: 残差峰值数量 (residual peak count)
feature_descriptions.X22: 残差主频能量占比 (dominant frequency energy ratio)

notes: 系统层使用X1-X5基础特征 + X11-X22扩展特征（共17个）
模块层根据系统层检测到的异常类型进行特征分流：
- 幅度异常模块：使用幅度相关特征（X1,X2,X5,X6,X7,X11-X13,X19-X22）
- 频率异常模块：使用频率相关特征（X4,X14-X18）
- 参考异常模块：使用参考相关特征（X1,X3,X5,X11-X13）
所有模块层还使用传统特征：step_score, res_slope, ripple_var, df, viol_rate, bias, gain
